workshoptitle: Capture Oracle Database Changes for CI/CD

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Development environment preparation
tutorials.description: Provision Oracle Cloud Infrastructure basic resources to Capture Oracle Database Changes for CI/CD.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Use SQLcl to Capture Database Changes with Liquibase
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to capture changes in Oracle Database using Liquibase, from SQLcl command line, and push them to your GitHub repository.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Use SQL Developer to Capture Database Changes with Liquibase
tutorials.description: This lab shows how easy it is to capture changes in Oracle Database using Liquibase, from SQL Developer worksheet GUI, and push them to your GitHub repository.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
